duration_raw: until the start of your next turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Thermal Stasis](/Spells.aspx?ID=1136)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 20</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the start of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

The same abilities that let you raise or lower thermal energy also let you keep it at a safe medium. The target gains resistance 2 against fire damage and resistance 2 against cold damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Each resistance increases by 2.

---

<column gap="tiny">
**Amp** The spell's duration becomes 1 minute.

</column>
name: Thermal Stasis
